name: EvolV
description:
A game for Trijam 122 Transformation; Micro things

You are a Bio-infiltrator drone loose in the Microzone!

Break down cell defences before absorbing the cell nucleus to evolve.

Red cells increase your speed

Yellow cells optimise your size

Green cells increase energy efficiency

Fire with Z

Dash with X

This one totally blew the 3hr time limit. I thought I'd save time by not drawing many graphics but then spent a bunch of time trying to remember how polar co-ordinates work instead. After 3hrs I had a wooshy circle flying around the void-field-thingie but no actual game. Ah well.

The rotating triangle changes as the three attributes change, although it's a bit hard to see. The "evolution" gimmick was supposed to be the "transformation" theme but that never quite clicked in the game.
